docs.lead_paragraph: Fifteen-month-old Michael Kiernan got a teddy bear from Governor Rockefeller yesterday, and when it was being presented to him by the Governor's secretary he almost lunged out of his father's arms to grab it and hug it and smile at it.

headline.main: SPECIAL BABY GETS GOVERNOR'S GIFT; First Saved From PKU Under State Law Receives Toy

docs.abstract: Annual NYS health conf, NYC; Gov Rockefeller pledges to continue pub health program as '1st order of business,' s read by aide; Comr Ingraham s on pub health problems
docs.snippet: Fifteen-month-old Michael Kiernan got a teddy bear from Governor Rockefeller yesterday, and when it was being presented to him by the Governor's secretary he almost lunged out of his father's arms to grab it and hug it and smile at it.
